body: An eidolon learns to cast dimension door as a spell-like ability once per day. The caster level for this evolution is equal to the eidolon's Hit Dice. The save DC for this spell is 10 + 1/2 the eidolon's HD + the eidolon's Charisma modifier. The eidolon must have a Charisma score of at least 14 to take this evolution. The summoner must be at least 13th level before selecting this evolution.
name: Dimension Door
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Spellcasting Class Options/Summoner/Evolutions/4-Point Evolutions/Dimension Door
